subject: Software License Compliance Issue
description: Software audit revealed that company is using more licenses than purchased. Multiple users are sharing licenses which violates software agreements and could result in legal action.
resolution: Purchased additional licenses and implemented license management
resolution_steps: Conducted comprehensive software audit across all systems
Identified all installed software and license usage
Purchased additional licenses to meet compliance requirements
Implemented license management software for tracking
Trained users on proper license usage
prevention_measures: Implement license management system and regular audits
